title: I Left My Suit in San Francisco
description:
Newly inducted Boxing Hall of Famer Laila Ali joins the show to discuss her boxing career and her father’s legacy. But first, Jalen & Jacoby hit all the angles for Game 6 of the Finals. Will Jayson Tatum have enough to extend this series? Jalen was so confident in a Game 7 that he left his suit behind in San Francisco. And Draymond Green had very high praise for LeBron during media day. What was he trying to say? All that and more.


And Draymond Green had very high praise for LeBron during media day. What was he trying to say? All that and more.
